name: Krypto (alexe1)
description:
For a better experience, download the executable version!

Add, subtract, divide and multiply your cards in order to get to the result in this casual pixelart math game.

3 different unique game modes:

  • Casual
  • Rounds
  • Time trial

Hotkeys:

  • Z = Add
  • X = Subtract
  • C = Multiply
  • V = Divide
  • Right click = Undo
  • Space = Randomize again (Casual mode only)
